institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 28 (Notice of Competition)
contents: Article 28 (Announcement of Competition) ① The Korean Committee divides the notice of opening of domestic competitions pursuant to Paragraph 2 of Article 25 of the Enforcement Decree into national and local competitions and announces them as follows two months prior to the opening of the competition., 1. Nationwide Competitions are announced in the central daily newspaper under the name of the Minister of Employment and Labor and the president, and local competitions are announced by the Korean Committee in the central daily newspaper in the name of city/provincial governors and city/provincial committee chairs. 2. Local competitions are announced by the Korean Committee in accordance with the circumstances of the city/provincial committee. An additional announcement may be made in a daily newspaper, and the Ministry of Employment and Labor and the Korean Council must be indicated as the sponsoring organizations. ② The announcement of the opening of the competition pursuant to paragraph 1 shall include the competition period, holding area, competition type, venue, participation qualifications, etc. An announcement must be made including the necessary information for the event.
